verses.text: O sing unto the Lᴏʀᴅ a new song: sing unto the Lᴏʀᴅ, all the earth.
Sing unto the Lᴏʀᴅ, bless his name; shew forth his salvation from day to day.
Declare his glory among the heathen, his wonders among all people.
For the Lᴏʀᴅ is great, and greatly to be praised: he is to be feared above all gods.
For all the gods of the nations are idols: but the Lᴏʀᴅ made the heavens.
Honour and majesty are before him: strength and beauty are in his sanctuary.
Give unto the Lᴏʀᴅ, O ye kindreds of the people, give unto the Lᴏʀᴅ glory and strength.
Give unto the Lᴏʀᴅ the glory due unto his name: bring an offering, and come into his courts.
O worship the Lᴏʀᴅ in the beauty of holiness: fear before him, all the earth.
Say among the heathen that the Lᴏʀᴅ reigneth: the world also shall be established that it shall not be moved: he shall judge the people righteously.
Let the heavens rejoice, and let the earth be glad; let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof.
Let the field be joyful, and all that is therein: then shall all the trees of the wood rejoice
Before the Lᴏʀᴅ: for he cometh, for he cometh to judge the earth: he shall judge the world with righteousness, and the people with his truth.
